original_text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom, and understandeth it not, then cometh the wicked one, and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart. This is he which received seed by the way side.
korean_text: 아무나 천국 말씀을 듣고 깨닫지 못할 때는 악한 자가 와서 그 마음에 뿌려진 것을 빼앗나니 이는 곧 길 가에 뿌려진 자요

sentences.original_text: When any one heareth the word of kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람이 하나님 나라의 말씀을 들을 때에

sentences.original_text: and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart
sentences.korean_translation: 그 마음에 뿌려진 것을 빼앗아 간다

sentences.original_text: which received seed by the way side
